wordGroup: clay figurine n. 泥人；泥塑，泥雕

sentences.en: Does my Iron Man collectible figurine watch me when I sleep?
sentences.cn: 我收藏的钢铁侠公仔也会在我睡觉的时候看着我吗？

sentences.en: Carved figurine of an Upsara, on the walls of the Ankor Wat temple in Siam Reap, Cambodia.
sentences.cn: 柬埔寨暹粒吴哥窟寺庙墙上的雕刻塑像。

sentences.en: No, Santa isn't feeling depressed - this figurine has been placed on the ledge of a Prague strip club.
sentences.cn: 圣诞老人可从来不会像这样忧郁。布拉格一家夜总会的圣诞老人塑像带上了忧伤的情调。
